metadata.synopsis: Though he has a girlfriend, a man (Alexis Martin) agrees to father his best friend's (Pascale Bussières) child.

reviews: Villeneuve demonstrates a capacity for synthesis through a very careful staging in which he suggests much more than his brief dialogues say. [Full Review in Spanish]
...a sporadically intriguing yet mostly self-indulgent first film from a director who would go onto much better things...
